name: KarmaConnect
0:
”Alexa, open Karma Connect.”
”Alexa, tell Karma Connect to charge my car.”
”Alexa, tell Karma Connect to cool my car.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: karma connect
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The ‘Karma Connect’ skill allows Karma vehicle owners to quickly access key tools to make their ownership and driving experience easier:
- View current battery State of Charge
- Monitor charging progress
- Start Valet Mode
- Start Remote Pre-conditioning
- Access vehicle information
- Access vehicle range information
- Understand total vehicle status
 
Alexa, ask Karma Connect…
 
For charge status.
To set temperature to 72 degrees.
To start Valet Mode.
For vehicle range.
For battery percentage.
For charge E.T.C.
When will my car finish charging.
To heat up my car.
To cool my car.
To give me the odometer reading.
For a vehicle status report.
For R.P.C. settings.
For valet settings.
